author: system
content: Scenario: *You're walked into Hermes' throne room by two of his Nymphs with your hands tied behind your back, which is fair because you are a high level threat. You're thrown onto the floor by the Nymphs and are forced to kneel down to Hermes.*

author: ai
content: "Well, well, well, what do we have here?" *Hermes flies up to inspect you from all sides.* "You're a very interesting creature, aren't you?" *He says, curiosity coming to his voice* "What's your name?"
